mapper.insert: insert into role (roleName, createTime, state, other) values (#{roleName}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{other})

insert into userInfo(id, userName, realName, iphone, email, place, isRegister, createTime, sex, image, state, lastTime) values (#{id}, #{userName}, #{realName}, #{iphone}, #{email}, #{place}, #{isRegister}, #{createTime}, #{sex}, #{image}, #{state}, #{lastTime})
insert into workunit (unitName, person, telephone, email, address, state) values (#{unitName}, #{person}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{state})

insert into bookinfo (bookName, createTime, author, publish, kind, pageNum, price, path, unitId, borrowState, circulateState) values (#{bookName}, #{createTime}, #{author}, #{publish}, #{kind}, #{pageNum}, #{price}, #{path}, #{unitId}, #{borrowState}, #{circulateState})
insert into circulate (bookId, unitId, userId, circulateTime, circulateReason, other, state) values (#{bookId}, #{unitId}, #{userId}, #{circulateTime}, #{circulateReason}, #{other}, #{state})
insert into borrow (bookId, userId, unitId, borrowTime, returnTime, state, other) values (#{bookId}, #{userId}, #{unitId}, #{borrowTime}, #{returnTime}, #{state}, #{other})
